Others: Los Angeles Lakers rookie Bronny James called his Friday preseason debut against the Minnesota Timberwolves a 'game for new beginnings.'
James recorded two points, an assist, and a rebound while leading the team with three blocks in the loss.
Lakers first-year head coach J.J. Redick praised James after the game as a'really disruptive defender.'
James plans to work on being aggressive on both ends of the court after watching back tape of his preseason debut.
LeBron James is expected to make his preseason debut against the Suns, which will mark the first time he and his son have both suited up for the same Lakers game.
